original_text: Terrible trouble will come to you! That is what the Almighty Lord says. You did even more wicked things than these.
korean_text: 주 여호와의 말씀이니라 너는 화 있을진저 화 있을진저 네가 모든 악을 행한 후에

sentences.original_text: Terrible trouble will come to you!
That is what the Almighty Lord says.
You did even more wicked things than these.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 이것들보다 더 악한 일을 저질렀다.
